statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, post_date, likes FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, post_date, reach FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT brand_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM InfluencerContentTracking GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, likes, shares FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, content_type, likes, comments FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE brand_id = 3 AND social_media_platform = 'Instagram'
SELECT brand_id, social_media_platform, MAX(likes) AS max_likes FROM InfluencerContentTracking GROUP BY brand_id, social_media_platform ORDER BY max_likes DESC
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM InfluencerContentTracking GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_likes > 500 AND total_comments > 50
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, content_type, post_date, likes, comments, shares, reach FROM InfluencerContentTracking WHERE reach > 1000 ORDER BY post_date ASC, likes DESC
SELECT * FROM BrandInfluencerContent
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, reach FROM BrandInfluencerContent WHERE impact > 50
SELECT platform_name, followers FROM SocialMediaPlatform ORDER BY followers DESC
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(reach) AS total_reach FROM BrandInfluencerContent GROUP BY influencer_id
SELECT platform_id, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement_rate FROM SocialMediaPlatform GROUP BY platform_id
SELECT * FROM BrandInfluencerContent WHERE reach > 1000 AND impact > 500
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, reach FROM BrandInfluencerContent WHERE influencer_id = 1234 ORDER BY reach DESC
SELECT b.influencer_id, p.platform_name, p.followers FROM BrandInfluencerContent b JOIN SocialMediaPlatform p ON b.platform_id = p.platform_id WHERE b.impact > 100
SELECT platform_name, engagement_rate FROM SocialMediaPlatform WHERE followers >= 50000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, impact FROM BrandInfluencerContent WHERE reach BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY impact DESC, influencer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT name, industry, budget FROM Brand WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers FROM Influencer ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT MAX(likes) AS max_likes FROM Post;
SELECT brand_id, name, industry, campaign_start, campaign_end FROM Brand WHERE campaign_start >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Influencer;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencer ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT post_id, content, COUNT(*) as total_engagement FROM Post GROUP BY post_id, content;
SELECT name, budget, campaign_start, campaign_end FROM Brand WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers, platform, post_id, content, likes, shares, comments FROM Influencer JOIN Post ON Influencer.influencer_id = Post.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand_info;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_platform FROM influencer ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, post_date, content_type FROM influencer JOIN content ON influencer.influencer_id = content.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, industry, social_media_handles FROM brand_info WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand_info;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, social_media_platform FROM influencer ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, social_media_platform FROM influencer WHERE follower_count > 50000;
SELECT brand_name, industry, social_media_handles FROM brand_info WHERE industry='Fashion';
SELECT content_type, reach_count FROM content GROUP BY content_type ORDER BY reach_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brand ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, platform FROM Influencer WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT content_description, post_date FROM Content WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name FROM SocialMediaPlatform WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Brand WHERE industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT content_id, post_date, influencer_id FROM Content ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name FROM SocialMediaPlatform WHERE platform_name LIKE '%book%';
SELECT content_id, likes, comments, shares FROM ContentEngagement WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC;
